    • createCompanion

      public void createCompanion​(Hike hike, Companion comp)
      Method checks if the given companion already exists in the database. If not, it adds the companion into the Companion table. Finally method adds a connection between the given hike and companion into the Hi_Co table.
      Specified by:
      createCompanion in interface HikeDao<Hike,​Integer>
      Parameters:
      hike - hike to add the companion for
      comp - companion to be added in the database and/or for the hike

    • createItem

      public void createItem​(Hike hike, Item item)
      Method checks if the given item already exists in the database. If not, it adds the item into the Item table. Finally method adds a connection between the given hike and item into the Hi_It table.
      Specified by:
      createItem in interface HikeDao<Hike,​Integer>
      Parameters:
      hike - hike to add the item for
      item - item to be added in the database and/or for the hike

    • createMeal
